alert.note: Alert for Eastern Hampden; Eastern Hampshire (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 12:50PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Tolland, south central Hampshire and south central Hampden Counties through 130 PM EDT... At 1249 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over West Springfield, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Very slow moving storms producing rainfall rates as high as 1 inch per hour may result in localized urban and poor drainage, minor flooding. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor nuisance flooding of typically flood prone areas. Locations impacted include... Springfield, Chicopee, Westfield, Holyoke, Agawam, West Springfield, Ludlow, South Hadley, Longmeadow, East Longmeadow, Belchertown, Wilbraham, Somers, Southwick, Granby, Southampton, and Hampden. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. Do not drive through flooded roads or underpasses. Avoid low lying areas near small streams.
